comments: Nesmith (IND) and Allen (CLE) come together at the same spot, and incidental foot to foot contact occurs as they separate.
LeVert (CLE) is already in Turner's (IND) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Nembhard (IND) contests LeVert's (CLE) jump shot and the contact after the release, and follow-through, is marginal.
Allen (CLE) is firming up over his right foot in Nesmith's (IND) path, and he absorbs the contact.
Garland (CLE) splits his feet at the start of his dribble.
Turner (IND) is firming up over his left foot in Okoro's (CLE) path and does not deliver contact during the pick.
Garland (CLE) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to the Pacers.

Replay review of the foul called on Niang (CLE) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful. Niang maintains a legal guarding position as he defends Siakam (IND) along the sideline.  Additionally, Siakam steps out of bounds and play correctly resumes with Cavaliers possession.
Niang (CLE) is firming up over his left foot in Nembhard's (IND) path, and the side to side contact during the screen is marginal.

Turner's (IND) left hand grazes the side of Okoro's (CLE) head, and marginal contact occurs during Okoro's shot near the rim. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Turner (IND) is already in Garland's (CLE) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Garland (CLE) contests Haliburton's (IND) jump shot attempt, and the contact with Haliburton's slightly extended right leg is marginal.
Nesmith (IND) grabs and holds Allen's (CLE) left arm as he attempts to tie up the ball.
Morris Sr. (CLE) inbounds the ball within five seconds.
Niang (CLE) is already in Nesmith's (IND) path when contact occurs, which he absorbs.
Haliburton (IND) commits a take foul on Garland (CLE).
Allen (CLE) pursues the rebound, and marginal contact occurs as Siakam (IND) gains possession.
